import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Calendar, dateFnsLocalizer } from "react-big-calendar"; import format from "date-fns/format" import parse from "date-fns/parse"; import startOfWeek from "date-fns/startOfWeek" import getDay from "date-fns/getDay"; const locales = { "en-US": require("date-fns/locale/en-US") } const localizer = dateFnsLocalizer({ format, parse, startOfWeek, getDay, locales }) const myEvents = [ { title : "Meeting", allDay : true, start : new Date(2022,2,1), end : new Date(2022,2,2) }, ] function CalendarUI() { const [newEvent, setNewEvent] = useState({title : "", start : "", end : ""}) const [allEvents, setAllEvents] = useState(myEvents) function handleAddEvent() { setAllEvents([...allEvents,newEvent]) } return(
Days of the Week
) } export default CalendarUI;
